description:
From our office in Clayton, Missouri, the attorneys at the Lake Munro, LLC, law firm provide unmatched counsel and support to clients throughout St. Louis County and across the state who have legal needs involving any of the following:

• Family law and divorce
• Adoptions
• Estate planning and probate
• Personal injury
• Traffic violation defense

Backed by more than 40 years of combined legal experience, our law firm's top-rated, award-winning attorneys possess the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently. We also promise to do all we can to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcomes you expect and deserve as cost-effectively as possible.

Known for our compassion and integrity when dealing with our clients, we have earned Superb client ratings on Avvo as well as perennial 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Family Law Attorneys. Moreover, we have also earned AV-Preeminent peer-review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell as well as Top 10 designations from Attorney and Practice Magazine.

Regardless of how complex your needs or the goals you wish to achieve, you can rely on us for solid, straightforward counsel to help you make the best-informed decisions as we fight hard to improve the likelihood for a successful outcome on your behalf.

To discuss your needs with a member of our team, you can contact Lake Munro, LLC, to take advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation. We also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy in these uncertain times.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
